text: Darrick is a given name. Notable people with the name include: *Darrick Brilz (born 1964), former American football offensive lineman *Darrick Brown (born 1984), American football cornerback *Darrick Brownlow (born 1968), former American football linebacker *Darrick Doerner, big wave pioneer in the sport of towsurfing *Darrick Martin (born 1971), American retired professional basketball player *Darrick Vaughn (born 1978), former American football defensive back ==See also== * *Derek *Derrick (name)
title: Darrick
